tuv.seg: Chicken with crispy Parma ham
香煎鸡胸肉配酥脆帕尔玛火腿
A delicious low-fat dish in just 30 minutes, perfect if friends drop by midweek
平日朋友来串门，总要会一道拿得出手的私房菜吧？
Ingredients
食材：
Serves 4
四人份
16 oz new potatoes , halved if large
16盎司小土豆，大的一切两半
8 oz runner beans , trimmed and sliced
8盎司四季豆，掐尖去筋切丝
4 skinless chicken breasts
4块去皮鸡脯肉
1 tbsp olive oil
1汤匙橄榄油
4 slices Parma ham
4片帕尔玛火腿
1 garlic clove, crushed
1颗大蒜瓣，切碎
juice 1 lemon
1颗柠檬，取汁
Method
制作做法：
1.Cook the new potatoes in boiling salted water for 10-15 mins, until just tender, adding the green beans for the final 2 mins.
1. 将小土豆放滚盐水烫个10-15分钟。待变软时，加入四季豆再煮2分钟。
Meanwhile, put each chicken breast between two sheets of cling film and bash them with a rolling pin until they're about 1cm thick. Season.
同时，将鸡胸肉用保鲜膜裹好，再拿擀面杖使劲捶打，直到每片只有1cm厚，调味。
2.Heat a large frying pan and add the Parma ham. Cook for 2 mins, until crisp. Drain on kitchen paper.
2. 起煎锅，把火腿煎2分钟直至酥脆，再用吸油纸控油。
Add the oil to the pan and add two of the chicken breasts. Cook for 3 mins each side, transfer to a plate and keep warm.
倒入橄榄油，加入2片鸡胸肉，每面煎约3分钟。
Cook the other two breasts in the same way.
同样方法煎剩下2片。
3.Remove the pan from the heat and add the garlic and lemon juice.
3. 关火，加入蒜末和柠檬汁。
Toss in the drained beans and potatoes and crumble in the Parma ham.
控干四季豆和土豆的水分，撒上火腿碎。
Divide the chicken and veg between four plates.
最后把鸡肉和配菜分别盛入4个盘子。
Nutrition per serving
营养价值：
302 kcalories, protein 42.0g, carbohydrate 20.0g, fat 7.0g, saturated fat 2.0g, fibre 2.0g, salt 0.96g.
卡路里：302千卡，蛋白质：42.0克，碳水化合物：20.0克，脂肪：7.0克，饱和脂肪：2.0克，纤维素：2.0克，盐：0.96克
